title: Gordon Brown | The Office of Gordon & Sarah Brown

quotes: In 2020, he played a key role leading a group of 275 former world leaders, economists and educationalists calling for international action to prevent the global health crisis creating a “COVID generation” to avoid the reality of tens of millions of children with no hope of an education.

time_markers.text: in the 2024 King’s Birthday Honours list
quotes: was appointed a Member of the Order of the Companions of Honour in the 2024 King’s Birthday Honours list.

organizations.name: International Commission on Financing Global Education Opportunity
quotes: crisis zones); and was Chair of the International Commission on Financing Global Education Opportunity that led to the creation of the International Financing Facility for Education.

organizations.name: International Financing Facility for Education
quotes: that led to the creation of the International Financing Facility for Education.

organizations.name: WHO
quotes: In his role as WHO Ambassador, Gordon has been invited by WHO Director-General Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus to raise awareness internationally on the great need for sustained global health financing, particularly from G20 and G7 countries, and to continue to explore ways to work together to finance the vaccination of the whole world and protect the poorest countries from the terrible effects of COVID-19 and other diseases.

organizations.name: Graça Machel Trust
quotes: In addition to his global education work Gordon is an advisor to the Graça Machel Trust

organizations.name: Royal Society of Edinburgh
quotes: , and he is also an Honorary Fellow of the Royal Society of Edinburgh.

organizations.name: Our Scottish Future
quotes: Within the United Kingdom, Gordon is also the founder of Our Scottish Future, a non-profit research and campaign organisation focused on building a stronger Scotland in a better Britain.

organizations.name: University of Edinburgh
quotes: Gordon has a PhD in History from the University of Edinburgh and spent his early career working as a lecturer and in television production. He has been awarded several honorary doctorates including the Universities of Edinburgh, Glasgow, Abertay and The Open University as well as a number of international doctorates.

organizations.name: Theirworld
quotes: He is married to Sarah Brown, the Chair of global children’s charity, Theirworld and Executive Chair of the Global Business Coalition for Education, and the couple live in Fife, Scotland and have two grown up children.

roles.title: former Prime Minister
quotes: Books Seven Ways to Change the World (2021) Identifying seven key areas of global crisis, the former Prime Minister sets out his manifesto for ensuring practical change to create a fairer, safer and more equal society.

roles.title: former Prime Minister and Britain’s longest-serving Chancellor
quotes: My Life, Our Times (2017) In his memoirs, the former Prime Minister and Britain’s longest-serving Chancellor tells of a remarkable life in politics, shedding light on the major political, social and economic changes that have reshaped the country over the past 40 years.
Within the United Kingdom, Gordon is also the founder of Our Scottish Future, a non-profit research and campaign organisation focused on building a stronger Scotland in a better Britain.
